title: Literary Argument - central question and answers

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze the central question the work raises, the extent to which it offers any answers, and how it contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze the central question the work raises, the extent to which it offers any answers, and how it contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
